TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SpeechRecognizer extends Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Recognizer
Public NotInheritable Class SpeechRecognizer Inherits Recognizer

Docs.summary: Performs speech recognition from microphone, file, or other audio input streams, and gets transcribed text as result.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DeploymentId : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets/sets the deployment id of a customized speech model that is used for speech recognition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResult> RecognizeAsync() cil managed
Public Function RecognizeAsync () As Task(Of SpeechRecognitionResult)

Docs.summary: Starts speech recognition, and stops after the first utterance is recognized. The task returns the recognition text as result. Note: RecognizeAsync() returns when the first utterance has been recognized, so it is suitable only for single shot recognition like command or query. For long-running recognition, use StartContinuousRecognitionAsync() instead.
Docs.returns: A task representing the recognition operation. The task returns a value of

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task StartContinuousRecognitionAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Starts speech recognition on a continuous audio stream, until StopContinuousRecognitionAsync() is called. User must subscribe to events to receive recognition results.
Docs.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task StartKeywordRecognitionAsync(class Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.KeywordRecognitionModel model) cil managed
Public Function StartKeywordRecognitionAsync (model As KeywordRecognitionModel) As Task

Docs.param: The keyword recognition model that specifies the keyword to be recognized.
Docs.summary: Starts speech recognition on a continuous audio stream with keyword spotting, until StopKeywordRecognitionAsync() is called. User must subscribe to events to receive recognition results. Note: Key word spotting functionality is only available on the Cognitive Services Device SDK. This functionality is currently not included in the SDK itself.
Docs.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task StopContinuousRecognitionAsync() cil managed

Docs.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that stops the recognition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task StopKeywordRecognitionAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Stops continuous speech recognition with keyword spotting. Note: Key word spotting functionality is only available on the Cognitive Services Device SDK. This functionality is currently not included in the SDK itself.
Docs.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that stops the recognition.
